document_data.name: Truent Tyranon
document_data.mainbody: '''Truent Tyranon''' was a seasoned [[Cormyr]]ian warrior in [[Scardale]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Truent led the Cormyrean garrison in the city. He found himself trusted in delicate diplomatic matters. The Cormyrean government was starting to consider a retreat but did not want to favor the [[Zhent]]s by any means.
